scripts.build: mkdir -p dist filters lib && npm run build:prism-browser && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:spec && npm run build:filters && npm run build:erb-compiler
scripts.build:filters: bundle exec ruby scripts/transpile_filter.rb ../../lib/ruby2js/filter/functions.rb > filters/functions.js && bundle exec ruby scripts/transpile_filter.rb ../../lib/ruby2js/filter/active_support.rb > filters/active_support.js && bundle exec ruby scripts/transpile_filter.rb ../../lib/ruby2js/filter/cjs.rb > filters/cjs.js && bundle exec ruby scripts/transpile_filter.rb ../../lib/ruby2js/filter/erb.rb > filters/erb.js && bundle exec ruby scripts/transpile_filter.rb ../../lib/ruby2js/filter/esm.rb > filters/esm.js && bundle exec ruby scripts/transpile_filter.rb ../../lib/ruby2js/filter/phlex.rb > filters/phlex.js && npm run build:rails-filters
scripts.build:rails-filters: mkdir -p filters/rails && bundle exec ruby scripts/transpile_filter.rb ../../lib/ruby2js/filter/rails/model.rb > filters/rails/model.js && bundle exec ruby scripts/transpile_filter.rb ../../lib/ruby2js/filter/rails/controller.rb > filters/rails/controller.js && bundle exec ruby scripts/transpile_filter.rb ../../lib/ruby2js/filter/rails/routes.rb > filters/rails/routes.js && bundle exec ruby scripts/transpile_filter.rb ../../lib/ruby2js/filter/rails/migration.rb > filters/rails/migration.js && bundle exec ruby scripts/transpile_filter.rb ../../lib/ruby2js/filter/rails/seeds.rb > filters/rails/seeds.js && bundle exec ruby scripts/transpile_filter.rb ../../lib/ruby2js/filter/rails/logger.rb > filters/rails/logger.js && bundle exec ruby scripts/transpile_filter.rb ../../lib/ruby2js/filter/rails/helpers.rb > filters/rails/helpers.js
scripts.test: npm run test:cli && npm run test:walker && npm run test:all-specs
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist filters ruby2js.js ruby2js-cli.js prism_browser.js
scripts.pack: npm run build:prism-browser && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:filters && npm pack
